name: BORN
description:
"BORN" from METACHROMATIC SERIES (1/3)
Graphite Pencil on Paper
2550x3500
300dpi
Personal Use Only

- We are shall not be free from bad things. Actions based on greed, hatred and not knowing how to beat oneself. -

In my culture, freeing up birds from their cages during worship rituals as a meaning to let go of bad luck in life which also gives life to fellow living beings. This is a symbol of establishing a sustainable life with nature.

In Metachromatic Series I want to visualize in a surreal way that humans depicted as birds and unable to free themselves because they are self-trapped and controlled by the mind, subconscious and destiny as a human being. So all the bad value itself remains.

I think "BORN" is the right title to introduce this series and for minting my first artwork.

Hope you enjoy and support it. Thank you.
